title: Language Learning Process Design in Remote PBL Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience with Online Learning
context.additional_context: Short-term language project course in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Most learners are job seekers requiring practical language proficiency for real-life applications

learning_goals: Learners can complete language project deliverables using mobile-based collaboration tools
Learners can fulfill peer evaluation and feedback processes in a PBL environment at over 80% compliance
Learners can produce communication scenarios in the target language using digital media (audio/video) at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
